verses.verse: אָ֚ז <WH227> 'az Then יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> yik-Ra called יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a', Then Joshua לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <WH7206> lo-r-'u-ve-Ni the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <WH1425> ve-lag-ga-Di; and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> ve-la-cha-Tzi and the half מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> mat-Teh tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh

Jordan
